Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I am experiencing some issues with B9: It seems to be that any part which should have a unique moving function doesn't work. Most notably, any landing gear or cargo bay doors don't give the option to deploy/retract or open/close in or our out of the hangar, and the landing gear seems to display some pretty random physics. These parts always remain deployed/open right from the point they are selected in the hangar. I also cannot assign them to action groups. I have had this problem with every version of B9 I have installed, but there is nothing on any forum that addresses it.

I would be very grateful for any help or suggestions.

Thanks

Edited January 5, 2015 by *JK*

Sounds like firespitter is missing. Try downloading the latest DLL and putting it in gamedata/firespitter/plugin/

Can download the DLL here: https://github.com/snjo/Firespitter/raw/master/For%20release/Firespitter/Plugins/Firespitter.dll
That was it - Thanks a lot man
